item.description:
Let's see the final segment of the movie version of Ayn Rand's classic saga of resistance to excessive government. The show starts at 4:15 but let's gather in the lobby first so we can enter as a group and find seats.

You may wish to order your ticket(s) ahead of time at

https://www.fandango.com/transaction/ticketing/redvines/ticketboxoffice.aspx?row_count=3626052402&mid=156928&refreshdate=10/13/2012&tid=AAPNV

If you get a message that no tickets are available for this showing click on 4:15 and hit enter.

After the show, we'll head to Silvertone Bar and Grill, 69 Bromfield Street to discuss the film over some grub and grog. www.silvertonedowntown.com.

Thurman Smith  781-729-3832 (try this first) /  cell 617-571-3740
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my pic; I;ll be in the front of the lobby.
item.name: See "Atlas Shrugged Part II"
